overview: The pineal gland — otherwise known as the “third eye” — has long been considered a centre for navigation, and helps to maintain the body’s circadian rhythms. In JJ Stratford’s “Worry Is A Horizontal”, which was created using her custom software The Pineal Paintbrush, a resonance wave stimulates an affected person’s pineal gland, providing a transdimensional rendering of existence outside the scope of accepted reality.
title: Worry Is A Horizontal
